did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Materials include typescripts with holograph notes of addresses, radio talks, and articles given or written by Atkinson, chiefly concerning higher education. Some addresses accompanied by press releases.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Addresses, Radio Talks, and Articles (AZ 294). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: President of Montana State College, 1919-1937, and President of University of Arizona, 1937-1947.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series:

list.item: Series I: Montana State College articles and addresses, 1919-1937
Series II: University of Arizona addresses, 1937-1951
Series III: University of Arizona articles, 1937-1947

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescripts with holograph notes of addresses, radio talks, and articles given or written by Atkinson, chiefly concerning higher education. Some addresses accompanied by press releases.

item.corpname: University of Arizona. Office of the President.
